body: Hello forum, I was doing some simulation analysis with these two methods and had some strange results. Could it be the climate file thing, because I keep getting the same results. Being inexperienced in these things (but I'm getting there)) I have little idea of what could cause these weird results. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zxy*xRp5iQ4l96HzkhD54VO6CJ41E3iBHQpjkjcuUHiu*bcCehoMIIsQSFWITEP4qz9MaprIpr4dVh1kO5CG9Lni3vigRv9k/1.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com/files/zxy*xRp5iQ4em-agxCdi5mAZi*8qrW0awJSy0OjJVP66CSDHVnGai1680tMXCNboMFaKU0V1UAgyFVe8edzWLS*RvXMQloBl/2.PNG)I've internalised all the necessary data, sliders are set to represent problem instances, definitions are safe to open.
